p:
SRS will be applied in one to a maximum of six fractions. For SRS, the dose prescription to the PTV will be as follows (risk adapted SRS dose prescription volume and location based):
20 Gy to the 70%-isodose (lesions < 2 cm max. diameter)
18 Gy to the 70%-isodose (lesions 2–3 cm max. diameter)
6 × 5 Gy to the conformally surrounding isodose (lesions > 3 cm max. diameter or brain stem)
